ValidationRule.description: If the RVP is in the Central region user must select a LAM State
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( $User.RVP__c = "RVP Central", $User.RVP__c = "RVP West", $User.RVP__c = "RVP National" ), ISPICKVAL(Local_Area_Market_State__c,"") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a LAM State and LAM.
